column5: Anyone been out on Rice in the past few days? Getting any slabs, or jumbo's?

Hi, I was up there for the opener.  8 to 12" of ice where I was.  Brought the vex out, was fishing in about 9 feet of water. Was marking a couple but no takers.  Moved spots in 5 feet of water and we had better luck.  # nice crappie right off bottom and 6 gills.  All in all, a nice experience ice fishing outside the cottage for the first time ever.  Oh ya, all fish caught on a tear drop tipped with a minnow head.  Good luck everyone and be safe.
Nice, thanks for the update. I might try my luck this weekend!  Cheers
